```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(grid)
library(jpeg)
library(png)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Comprehensive and clean shot statistics from Ivy League games

brown_game <- read_excel("brown_shots.xlsx")
dart_game <- read_excel("dart_shots.xlsx")
corn_game <- read_excel("cornell_shots.xlsx")
penn_game <- read_excel("penn_shots.xlsx")

# Binding all of the shot data together into one data frame in then writing onto "shot_data" to be
# used in the Shiny app

brown_game %>% 
  bind_rows(dart_game) %>% 
  bind_rows(corn_game) %>% 
  bind_rows(penn_game) %>% 
  write_rds(path = "/Users/charlie/Data/project/web_app/shot_data")
```
